summary: A small, but lovely town in The Rift, named Dorthal.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Arial][color=#00b050]Dorthal[/color]

[/font][/b][color=#cc0000][size=3]Okay, I calmed down from losing 60+ hours of progress.. back to work then. [/size][/color]

[center][font=Arial][size=4][b][color=#ff0000]Disclamer: I worked several weeks on this mod, but its far from finished. I'm planning to improve it later on, but if I could not, I still wouldn't want this mod to go to waste.[/color][color=#ff00ff]
[/color][/b][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Century Gothic][size=4]This small town is located in The Rift. It doesn't have quests (yet!), but its still nice to bump into it, and look around.[/size][/font]
[font=Century Gothic][size=4]I have a LOT of plans for it, but it already has the following:[/size][/font][/center][font=Century Gothic][size=4]
[/size][/font]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[font=Century Gothic][size=5][b]14 NPCs:[/b][/size][/font]
[font=Century Gothic][size=3]ex.: Merchants, a Herbalist, Farmers etc.[/size][/font]

[font=Century Gothic][size=5][b]4 Houses, a Shack and an Inn.[/b][/size][/font]

[font=Century Gothic][size=5][b]Unique drinks[/b] [/size][/font]
[font=Century Gothic][size=4]("Herbal Distillates")

[b]Also a hidden cache ;)[/b]
[/size][/font]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



[center][b][size=4][color=#efefef]Dorthal is[/color][color=#ff0000] incompatable [/color][color=#efefef]with:[/color][color=#ff0000] [/color][color=#ff00ff]
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65839/?]Blackthorn - A Buildable Town in The Rift[/url]
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33169/?]Twiltic Manor[/url]
[/color][/size][/b][/center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]If you have any problems or suggestions, please write them down in the comment section, down below.[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]If you enjoy the mod, please endorse and follow me.

Special thanks to Treyman1263 for keeping the soul in me and testing my mods!! :)

[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Thanks,[/size][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Sincierly,[/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4]Ziggy[/size][/font]
author: Ziggy
